88908.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"55eqk","text":"Formulatrix Protein Crystallization Imager","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fuves","text":"SPT mosquito ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcev7","text":"P10 pipette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8oq6o","text":"SwissCI 3 lens plate [UVXPO-3LENS3W96T-PS3W96T-UVP]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgq3t","text":"Seed beads [Hampton HR4-782]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em8oi","text":"Crystalline material","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e37m1","text":"Vortex","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7fs3l","text":"0.5 mL Eppendorf tubes [Eppendorf Catalog No. 0030121023]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2g3bi","text":"Produce crystals to use for seeding. Micro crystalline protein material can be used to produce a seed stock as well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hemp","text":"Set up the serial dilution for step 10 using the reservoir solution used to obtain the starting crystalline material  . Make up an appropriate volume; most seeding uses   of seed stock, meaning a SwissCI 3 lens 96 well plate could require ~  of seed stock per plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":117,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":169,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":240,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8dii6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20-50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2861}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"14.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b0qs8","text":"Add seed beads to the undiluted tube in the serial dilution (Check manufacture instructions).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"r8k5","text":"For Hampton glass beads, use 2 beads in a 0.5 mL Eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"768hh","text":"Under a microscope, open the well containing the crystal material being used and crush the crystals. From this step onwards proceed rapidly as the seed stocks are metastable and need to be frozen as soon as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":101,"length":115}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"250na","text":"Pipette  from the reservoir well into the drop well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6d1i2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1bgtk","text":"Mix the solution by aspiration a minimun of three times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jei4","text":"Transfer to the first tube set up for the serial dilution that will remain undiluted and is marked \"undiluted seed stock\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d68bn","text":"Repeat steps 5-7 until there is no more crystal in the drop well. To ensure all available crystal material is recovered, a minimum of around   of reservoir solution should be used in this process","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":141,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"91ce4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"652il","text":"Vortex the undiluted tube containing the seed beads – 30 seconds on vortex then 30 seconds on ice, repeating three times. Take   of the seed stock and check under microscope whether crystals have been crushed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":127,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"358dd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29oah","text":"Carry out the set up serial dilution using the undiluted seed stock and freeze stocks at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":89,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9rgvo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ka5g","text":"Based on what your project needs, decide which condition made from the serial dilution makes the best results with good reproducability. If needed, further optimise around the dilution e.g. if 1/100 works best, try using 1/20, 1/50 and 1/200; repeat until crystals are acceptable for your project and its timeframe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9rjvo","text":"The COVID-19 pandemic has highlighted the need to identify novel therapeutic interventions and strategies for pandemic preparedness against Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2). This protocol outlines the crystallization protocol and buffer conditions used to obtain reproducible SARS-CoV-2 Mpro crystals suitable for XChem fragment screening.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":342,"length":5}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8A3F363AA0AB48338B6BAEF8047A4CC5","url":"https://www.diamond.ac.uk/Instruments/Mx/Fragment-Screening.html"}}}}
